title: Slow cooker beef and pepper stew
ingredients: ['1kg beef or braising steak, cut into strips', 'garlic powder to taste', '3 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1 beef stock cube', '60 to 100ml hot water', '1 tablespoon cornflour', '1/2 onion, chopped', '2 large peppers, sliced', '1 (400g) tin tomatoes, with liquid', '3 tablespoons soy sauce', '1 teaspoon sugar', '1 teaspoon salt']
